architectural_notes: Site should be fully mobile responsive.
Include gentle button animations (bounce/heartbeat, sparkles) and floating heart/sparkle background effects.

Page flow update requested: ask him to be your Valentine first, then show the Valentine note, then the date ask; keep overall visuals/interactions unchanged.
known_issues: Potential requirement conflict: prior scope says the date ask must not include any specific date; user requests mentioning â€˜2026â€™, which may be considered a specific date/year.

existing_features.title: Create a fully mobile-responsive, multi-step romantic website experience (single-page stepper or routes) with the following sequence and navigation buttons, matching the user-provided copy exactly where specified: (1) Welcome page -> (2) Rose Day page -> (3) Valentine Note (envelope open interaction) -> (4) Big Question -> (5) 3 red envelopes surprise page -> (6) Final message page. Each step must have a clear primary button to proceed to the next step as described by the user.

Add a coherent, consistent visual theme across all steps: a soft pastel pink + cream â€œsticker scrapbookâ€ aesthetic with romantic handwriting-style headings, subtle paper/grain texture, rounded cards, and sticker-like heart/rose accents (avoid blue/purple).
